sentences.en: As soon as his mother - in - law arrived, he made himself scarce.
sentences.cn: 他 岳母 一到, 他便溜走了.

sentences.en: Bear in mind that petrol stations are scarce in the more remote areas.
sentences.cn: 要牢记一点：在比较偏远的地方加油站很少见。

sentences.en: Eggs are cheap when they are plentiful and they are dear when they are scarce.
sentences.cn: 鸡蛋多了就便宜,少了就贵.

sentences.en: Eggs are scarce and expensive this month.
Food was often scarce in the winter.

sentences.cn: 食物供不应求，而且价格昂贵。

sentences.en: Fresh food is so scarce that prices have rocketed.
sentences.cn: 新鲜食物非常匮乏，导致价格猛涨。

sentences.en: In some places maps are scarce, and are often crudely produced.
sentences.cn: 有些地方很少有地图，而且通常绘制得都很粗糙。

sentences.en: It probably would be a good idea if you made yourself scarce.
Jobs in manufacturing are relatively scarce but I keep my ear to the ground.
sentences.cn: 制造业的就业机会相对很少，但是我时刻留意着信息。

sentences.en: The food was scarce during the war.
There was fierce competition for the scarce resources .
sentences.cn: 对这些紧缺资源的争夺非常激烈。

sentences.en: This kind of material is rather scarce.
Why is full-frontal male nudity still so scarce in films?
sentences.cn: 为什么男性正面全裸的镜头在电影里还是如此少见呢？

words.tran_cn: 几乎不，简直不；简直没有

phrases.tran_cn: 溜走，悄悄离开：离开，尤指快速地或鬼鬼祟祟地；潜逃

trans.tran_en: if something is scarce, there is not very much of it available

trans.tran_cn: 勉强，仅仅，几乎不，简直不
